name: Tilecraft: A New Horizon
description:
Work in progress: 

'Tilecraft:  A New Horizon' is a game project I'm attempting to build and release in less than one month.  I've been working on it for just about a month and I'm finally ready to get some playtesting in from other people!  Would love to hear your thoughts on what's working and what isn't. 

-Stephen Hubbard
